arts.ttl: Stuttgart end St. Pauli's unbeaten start in comfortable win
arts.sum: Ermedin Demirovic's brilliant finish and a first Bundesliga goal for former Leicester forward Bilal el Khannouss give Stuttgart a 2-0 home win over St. Pauli, ending the away side's unbeaten start to the season.

arts.ttl: Ermedin Demirović leads from the front as VfB Stuttgart sink St. Pauli
arts.sum: New Stuttgart captain Ermedin Demirović led the way with a goal and an assist while Bilal El Khannouss was also on target for the first time as VfB Stuttgart ended FC St. Pauli's unbeaten start to the season with a commanding 2-0 victory at the MHP Arena. Stuttgart's pressure finally told two minutes before half-time when Demirović collected a clever pass from Jamie Leweling, danced past three defenders and delicately lifted the ball over the onrushing Vasilj for a superb individual goal.

arts.ttl: Demirovic inspires Stuttgart to much-needed win over St. Pauli
arts.sum: Stuttgart secured only their second Bundesliga victory of 2025 with a 2-0 win over St. Pauli at MHPArena, easing some of the pressure that had grown after their late collapse in Freiburg.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: VfB Stuttgart vs. St. Pauli
arts.sum: The lineups have been announced ahead of VfB Stuttgart's clash against St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. St. Pauli preview: Struggling Stuttgart look to respond
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart welcome St. Pauli to MHPArena on Friday evening as the Bundesliga’s fourth matchday gets underway, with the hosts desperate to turn around their stuttering start to the season.
